mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, replytext, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select rno, bno, replytext, replyer, username, r.regdate, r.updatedate from tbl_reply r, tbl_member m where r.replyer = m.userid and bno = #{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext = #{replytext} where rno=#{rno}
